body_html:
I'm also running into this issue even after specifying MKLROOT as my Conda environment directory. Might I be missing something else?

Update:
I was able to get things working by just updating mkl in the base Conda environment. This probably won't work for everyone, but this was fine for me.
body_text:

Update:

body:
I'm also running into this issue even after specifying `MKLROOT` as my Conda environment directory. Might I be missing something else?

Update:
I was able to get things working by just updating `mkl` in the base Conda environment. This probably won't work for everyone, but this was fine for me.
